title: Swanky script Font
content:
I am trying to find this font, it is used on a wedding invite and described as swanky script, do you think it's an actual font or hand drawn? Thanks

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [uploaded-file-06282.jpeg](http://web.archive.org/web/20140901085538/http:/typophile.com/files/uploaded-file-06282.jpeg) | 166.96 KB |
author: ljmurphy88

comments.content: It’s a font: [Carolyna Black](http://web.archive.org/web/20140901085538/http:/myfonts.us/td-TlQNMs) (with different stylistic sets used).
